Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory311.png'}

{3: 'The multitude of noises disappear, and Alpha opens her eyes, while the surrounding area shakes violently. Just as she has expected, the dark figure is standing a distance away, effortlessly doing battle.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vonnegut', 3: 'Not bad, my respect for you is growing.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vonnegut', 3: 'Compared to these unscreened "seeds," I\'m more interested in one who has the qualifications to become an agent.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Agent? Alpha, could it be...?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'α', 3: 'I have no interest in that.', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vonnegut', 3: 'Such a pity.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'With a simple flick of his left hand in their direction, an invisible force surges like a wave against the group.'}
{3: 'Alpha unsheathes her katana and charges before slicing the invisible threat into two. The blade beams continue on toward Vonnegut, but are stymied by his force field.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vonnegut', 3: "Can you see it? Or is it simply a fighter's intuition of danger?", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Her attack has torn the wave apart and reversed its trajectory, leaving the ground charred.'}
{3: 'Vonnegut ambles toward Alpha, and red Punishing Virus currents flow and gather around him.'}
{3: 'Alpha feels her strength quickly being sapped.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'α', 3: "Never thought you'd stoop to such despicable methods.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Alpha scowls, continuously swinging her katana to block the projectiles coming from all directions before sheathing it to charge it.'}
{3: 'Just as she draws the blade and attempts to stab Vonnegut at lightning speed, he catches it, holding it firmly in his hand.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'α', 3: '...You caught a blade with your bare hands?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'But on closer inspection, there is a tiny gap between the blade and his hand.'}
{2: 'α', 3: "No, it's just another use of the force field.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vonnegut', 3: 'Good analysis.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'This time, he unleashes the lightning in close proximity.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kamui', 3: 'Watch out! Defensive formation!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vonnegut', 3: 'Will that really help?', 4: '1'}
{3: "The red beams explode and while the group's last-minute defensive formation was able to temporarily hold off his attack, the blast causes the floor beneath their feet to collapse."}
{3: 'The four plummet to the lower area, where they heard a gentle sigh from a woman nearby.'}
{2: '???', 3: "Well, this was an unexpected meeting, isn't it, Miss Alpha?"}
{3: 'Finding her balance, Alpha looks in the direction of the voice, and sees the woman who introduced herself as "The Merciful One" standing in front of them.'}
{3: 'Vonnegut also senses her presence and stops his attacks.'}
{3: 'The three beat a hasty retreat in the chaos and make for where 【kuroname】 is.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'α', 3: 'Merciful One, why are you still here?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'The Merciful One', 3: 'My apologies, I was drawn to the "Mother" in the greenhouse.'}
{2: 'The Merciful One', 3: "So I thought I'd stay and watch how she grows."}
{3: 'Vonnegut looks at The Merciful One in a rare bout of silence.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'α', 3: "(There's no need to remain here.)", 4: '1'}
{3: "Taking advantage of Vonnegut's inaction, Alpha makes for the exit."}
{3: 'Vonnegut sees Alpha leaving and does not try to stop her.'}
{3: 'The guest in front of him is the one that requires his full attention.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory338.jpg'}
{3: 'Leaving the collapsing sewers, Alpha returns to the ruins.'}
{3: 'She leaves the name tag she picked up while escaping near the transport craft, then turns and leaves the scorched earth behind.'}
{3: 'Once the dust and smoke from the explosion have settled, a tranquil silence returns to the area.'}
{3: 'The gale sweeps the shattered debris into its embrace and dances through the craters of the devastated land.'}
{3: 'The dust will one day heal the wounds of the earth, and life will begin anew.'}
{3: 'The transport craft carrying the Gray Ravens disappears into the sky.'}
{3: 'In the flow of the setting sun, a motorcycle speeds past the refugee camp and off into the horizon.'}
{3: 'Night is approaching, but never once does she look up at the sky.'}
